org.svvrl.goal.gui.pref
Class ProductOptionsPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.svvrl.goal.gui.pref.OptionsPanel<Properties>
                      org.svvrl.goal.gui.pref.ProductOptionsPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ProductOptionsPanel
extends OptionsPanel<Properties>

This class provides a panel for the adjustment of the options in taking a product of two automata. The structure of the product will be the same as the first automaton while the acceptance condition will depends only on the second automaton. By default, any proposition has the same meaning in both automata. In a synchronous setting, the user may define the propositions of the second automaton as predicates on the propositions of the first automaton. Whether custom predicates are defined or not and what are the defined predicates are returned by isPredicatesDefined() and getPredicates() (not getOptions()). As the two automata for taking the product may be chosen dynamically while adjusting the options in this panel, the propositions of the two automata can be set dynamically such that the defined predicates can be correctly validated.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
See Also:
Product, Serialized Form

Sets the atomic propositions of the two input automata for taking product. The already defined predicates will be revalidated.

ps2 - the propositions in the second automaton

getPredicates

public java.util.Map<Proposition,PL> getPredicates()
Returns the predicates defined in this panel. If isPredicatesDefined() returns false, an empty map will be returned.

the predicates defined in this panel
